messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

can check updates saturday pm updates installation test hello please separate tickets each by free disk install updates updates sp free disk install updates error test error updates thank best regards engineer saturday re updates installation test hello please informed starting patch please suspend polls attached best regards engineer wednesday updates installation test dear please informed patched saturday pm please notify scheduled works affected during form attached best regards engineer information confidential

This suggests I should be looking towards categories that reflect these activities.
